frontmatter.title: Hackerrank Solutions in Golang
frontmatter.description: My solutions to hackerrank practice problems in golang with explantions.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank Solve Me First Solution
frontmatter.description: Solution for hackerrank warmup question solve me first in golang. In this blog I'll discuss my solution, what mistakes I initially made and what concepts I learned.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank Solution of Simple Array Sum in Golang
frontmatter.description: Solution for hackerrank warmup question simple array sum in golang. In this blog I'll discuss my solution, what mistakes I initially made and what concepts I learned.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank Solution of Compare the Triplets in Golang
frontmatter.description: Solution for hackerrank warmup question compare the triplets in golang. In this question we will use if-else statement and arrays in golang for the first time along with for loops that we covered earlier.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank Solution of A Very Big Sum in Golang
frontmatter.description: Solution for hackerrank warmup question a very big sum in golang. This question is very similar to simple array sum problem. The only difference being that the input array is huge. Let's tackle that in this blog post.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank | Solution of Diagonal Difference in Golang
frontmatter.description: In this post we will solve the question diagonal difference from hackerrank in golang. We will learn how to create and use a 2-D matrix in Golang and how to traverse over it. Let's get started.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank | Solution of Plus Minus in Golang
frontmatter.description: In this post we will solve question plus minus from hackerrank. An easy one which only requires some type casting and formatted printing. Let's get started.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank | Solution of Staircase in Golang
frontmatter.description: In this post we will solve question staircase from Hackerrank. A simple one, only requires to decode the logic for pattern. Will need if-else and a nested for loop. Let's get started.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank | Solution of Mini-Max Sum in Golang
frontmatter.description: In this post we will solve question mini-max sum from hackerrank. Here we will learn a bit about make in golang along with a new golang package called sort. Let's get started.

frontmatter.title: Hackerrank | Solution of Birthday Cake Candles in Golang
frontmatter.description: In this post we will solve question Birthday Cake Candles from hackerrank. This is one of those questions, which packs a fancy description but in the end needs a simple logic to solve. Let's dive right into it.

frontmatter.description: In this one we will solve the last question from warmup section from hackerrank. Time Conversion. A quick and easy one, which only requires some formatting. Let's dive right into it.
